ComicInfo.Summary:
Who's play-acting and who's getting played? Nothing's what it seems in part four of this fast, funny, 100% cool new series, where vicious criminals act like respectable businessmen, a Hollywood starlet feigns weakness to gain power and a has-been action hero plays the role of loving husband while plotting to murder his wife!
*************************
It's a thin line between love and murder as the plot thickens in issue #4 of Image Comics' smash hit new crime series! But who's play-acting, who's getting played, who's the top dog...and who winds up as puppy chow? Hollywood gets weird as movie stars and gangsters switch places, starlets battle for power and reality is far wilder than even the wildest tabloid rumors!
